    [e][h]Version 7.30c
    Version Information
    Release Date:
    2021-09-10
    Highlights
    • Dawnbreaker added to Captains Mode
    • Balance Changes
    Chronology
     
     V7.30b
    V7.30d

    General[edit]

    • Added Dawnbreaker to Captain's Mode
    • Stacked Neutral Creeps gold and XP bounty reduced by 15% (Stacker gold bonus unaffected)
    • Ancient Black Dragon: Fireball Mana Cost increased from 100 to 200
    • Ancient Thunderhide: Frenzy Mana Cost increased from 50 to 75
    • Ancient Thunderhide: Slam Mana Cost increased from 90 to 150.

    Items[edit]

    Echo Sabre[edit]

    • Bonus Mana Regeneration from 2.25 to 1.75
    • Bonus Strength reduced from 15 to 13
    • Fixed Swashbuckle attacks and Toss Tree not putting echo sabre on cooldown.

    Monkey King Bar[edit]

    • Attack Speed Bonus increased from 35 to 45

    Silver Edge[edit]

    • Cooldown increased from 18 to 20 seconds

    Sange and Yasha[edit]

    • Status Resistance reduced from 25% to 22%

    Kaya and Sange[edit]

    • Status Resistance reduced from 25% to 22%

    Helm of Iron Will[edit]

    • Cost increased from 925 to 950

    Sacred Relic[edit]

    • Cost reduced from 3800 to 3750

    Armlet of Mordiggian[edit]

    • Recipe Cost reduced from 650 to 625 (Total cost unchanged)

    Crimson Guard[edit]

    • Recipe Cost reduced from 950 to 875 (total cost reduced from 3700 to 3650)

    Helm of the Dominator[edit]

    • Total Cost increased from 2350 to 2375

    Helm of the Overlord[edit]

    • Recipe Cost reduced from 1250 to 1225 (Total cost unchanged)
    • Bonus attributes reduced from +8 to +7
    • Bonus Health Regen reduced from +8 to +7
    • Bonus Armor reduced from +8 to +7
    • Dominated Creep Bounty increased from +200 to +250

    Neutral Items[edit]

    Ascetic's Cap[edit]

    • Status resist bonus reduced from 50 to 40
    • Bonus Health reduced from 300 to 250

    Blast Rig[edit]

    • Bonus Armor reduced from 8 to 7
    • Blind Duration reduced from 2.5 to 2

    Apex[edit]

    • Primary Stat Bonus reduced from 75 to 70

    Giant's Ring[edit]

    • Bonus Strength reduced from 40 to 35
    • Bonus Movement Speed reduced from 60 to 50

    Telescope[edit]

    • Bonus Cast Range reduced from 125 to 110
    • Bonus Attack Range reduced from 125 to 110

    Witchbane[edit]

    • Cleanse is now a single target spell

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Level 20 talent from +9 Armor to: -8s Borrowed Time Cooldown

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Base damage rescaled from 49-58 to 52-58
    • Chemical Rage mana cost from 50/100/150 to 50/75/100

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent +175 Chilling Touch Attack Range increased to +200
    • Level 15 Talent +150 Cold Feet breaking distance increased to +200
    • Level 20 Talent +70 Chilling Touch Damage increased to +80
    • Level 25 Talent 500 AoE cold feet reduced to 450

    Arc Warden[edit]

    • Strength reduced from 23 + 2.8 to 22 +2.6
    • Base Agility increased from 16 to 20 (Base Damage unchanged)
    • Spark Wraith Aghanim's Scepter secondary spark wraith activation delay reduced from 3s to 2.
    • Level 25 Talent +25% Lifesteal increased to 35%

    Bane[edit]

    • Strength gain reduced from 2.6 to 2.5
    • Agility gain reduced from 2.6 to 2.5
    • Intelligence gain reduced from 2.6 to 2.5
    • Level 10 Talent +15% Magic Resistance reduced to +12%
    • Level 25 Talent +5.5s Fiend's Grip Duration reduced to +5

    Batrider[edit]

    • Base Vision increased from 1200/800 to 1600/800
    • Sticky Napalm no longer increases Fae Grenade Damage
    • Sticky Napalm duration decreased from 8s to 7
    • Flamebreak damage per second reduced from 20 to 15
    • Firefly bonus vision reduced from 200/400/600/800 to 100/200/300/400
    • Firefly cooldown increased from 46/42/38/34 to 52/46/40/34

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Base damage reduced by 2
    • Primal Roar cooldown from 90/80/70 to 100/80/60
    • Level 10 Talent +20 Move Speed replaced with +1.75 Mana Regen
    • Level 15 Talent +3 Mana Regen replaced with +30 Move Speed.
    • Level 15 Talent +250 Health Beastmaster Controlled Units replaced with +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack.
    • Level 20 Talent -30s Primal Roar Cooldown replaced with +250 Health Beastmaster Controlled Units.
    • Level 25 Talent +4% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack replaced with -30s Primal Roar Cooldown

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.4 to 3.1
    • Fixed Level 15 Talent Bonus Rupture Damage not applying to a target that was already ruptured.
    • Level 10 Talent +10% Bloodrage Spell Amplification reduced to +8%

    Bounty Hunter[edit]

    • Jinada damage rescaled from 70/100/130/160 to 60/100/140/180

    Brewmaster[edit]

    • Level 25 Talent +80% Drunken Brawler Critical Strike Damage Increased to 90%

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Spin Web movement speed bonus rescaled from 0% at 20%HP -> 100% at 100% Health to 0% at 1HP -> 100% at 100% Health
    • Silken Bola bonus attack damage increased from 5/6/7/8 to 6/7/8/9

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Double Edge damage radius increased from 190 to 220
    • Level 20 Talent -20s Stampede Cooldown increased to -25

    Chaos Knight[edit]

    • Base Movement Speed increased from 320 to 325.
    • Chaos Strike proc chance increased from 30% to 33.33%
    • Reality Rift armor reduction increased from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7

    Chen[edit]

    • Divine Favor armor aura reduced from 2/3/4/5 to 1/2/3/4
    • Divine Favor Health Regen Aura increased from 1.25/2.5/3.75/5 to 1.5/3/4.5/6
    • Level 10 Talent +175 health increased to 200

    Clinkz[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 2.7 to 2.5
    • Attack Range reduced from 625 to 600
    • Burning Barrage cooldown increased from 28/24/20/16 to 30/26/22/18
    • Burning Barrage cast point increased from 0 to 0.2
    • Burning Barrage mana cost from 40/50/60/70 to 40/55/70/85
    • Skeleton Walk Shard Skeleton Archers duration reduced from 45s to 30
    • Death Pact bonus health reduced from 40%/70%/100% to 30%/55%/80%
    • Burning Army duration increased from 20s to 30

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Frostbite mana cost reduced from 140/145/150/155 to 125/135/145/155

    Dark Seer[edit]

    • Ion Shell Aghanim’s Scepter Bonus Health reduced from 300 to 275
    • Level 20 Talent -35s Wall of Replica cooldown increased to -40
    • Level 25 Talent 320 AoE surge increased to 350

    Dazzle[edit]

    • Base attack range increased from 550 to 575.
    • Level 20 Talent +36 Poison Touch DPS increased to +40

    Death Prophet[edit]

    • Intelligence gain reduced from 3.5 to 3.3
    • Agility gain increased from 1.4 to 1.8
    • Base mana regeneration increased from 0 to 0.5
    • Base Movement Speed increased from 320 to 325

    Disruptor[edit]

    • Level 25 Talent +275 Static Storm AoE reduced to 250
    • Level 25 Talent -11s Glimpse Cooldown increased to -12

    Dragon Knight[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 1
    • Elder Dragon Form Black Dragon Magic Resistance increased from 20% to 25%
    • Elder Dragon Form cooldown reduced from 115 to 115/110/105/100
    • Fireball DPS increased from 60 to 65

    Drow Ranger[edit]

    • Multishot now applies the bonus damage component of Frost Arrows

    Earthshaker[edit]

    • Enchant Totem Aghanim's Scepter air time decreased from 1s to 0.8s
    • Enchant Totem cast point reduced from 0.69 to 0.6

    Ember Spirit[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 2.6 to 2.9
    • Base Health Regen Increased from 0.5 to 0.75

    Enchantress[edit]

    • Impetus mana cost reduced from 65 to 55

    Grimstroke[edit]

    • Level 20 Talent +800 Stroke of Fate cast range increased to +1000
    • Level 25 Talent +40% Stroke of Fate damage increased to +50%

    Gyrocopter[edit]

    • Homing Missile Shard Rocket Barrage Range increased from 700 to 725

    Hoodwink[edit]

    • Acorn Shot slow duration increased from 0.25s to 0.35
    • Level 25 Talent no longer makes Sharpshooter deal pure damage.

    Huskar[edit]

    • Level 20 +35% Berserker's Blood Regen reduced to 30%
    • Level 25 +16% Life Break Damage increased to +20%

    Jakiro[edit]

    • Strength gain reduced from 3.0 to 2.8
    • Intelligence gain increased from 2.8 to 3.0
    • Macropyre damage increased from 100/140/180 to 110/155/200

    Keeper of the Light[edit]

    • Illuminate cooldown increased from 11 to 13
    • Illuminate damage reduced from 225/325/425/525 to 200/300/400/500
    • Illuminate travel speed reduced from 1050 to 900
    • Spirit Form bonus movement speed from 20/25/30% to 15/20/25%

    Lifestealer[edit]

    • Agility increased from 18 + 2.4 to 19 + 2.6

    Lina[edit]

    • Light Strike Array cooldown increased from 10/9/8/7 to 13/11/9/7
    • Laguna Blade Shard now also reduces mana cost by 100
    • Level 25 Talent +150 Attack Range reduced to 125

    Luna[edit]

    • Lucent Beam Aghanim’s Shard launches 1 attack instead of 2.
    • Lucent Beam Aghanim’s Shard search radius increased from 325 to 500
    • Eclipse cooldown decreased from 140 to 140/130/120

    Lycan[edit]

    • Feral Impuse bonus damage reduced from 12/24/36/48% to 11/22/33/44%
    • Feral Impuse bonus health regeneration reduced from 2/4/6/8 to 1/3/5/7
    • Level 10 Talent +15 Summon Wolves Damage reduced to +13
    • Level 10 Talent +8 Feral Impulse HP regen increased to +10
    • Level 15 Talent -20s Shapeshift Cooldown reduced to -15
    • Level 20 Talent +30% Feral Impulse Damage reduced to +25%

    Mirana[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent +75 Leap Attack Speed increased to +80
    • Level 20 Talent -25s Moonlight Shadow Cooldown reduced to -20
    • Level 25 Talent +180 Starstorm damage increased to +200

    Monkey King[edit]

    • Boundless Strike critical damage reduced from 150/175/200/225% to 135/165/195/225%
    • Tree Dance cooldown increased from 1 to 1.45/1.3/1.15/1

    Naga Siren[edit]

    • Base Strength reduced from 22 to 21
    • Level 20 Talent +10% Rip Tide Chance increased to 12%
    • Level 25 Talent -6 Rip Tide Armor increased to 7

    Nature's Prophet[edit]

    • Base Mana Regeneration increased from 0.5 to 0.75

    Night Stalker[edit]

    • Base HP regen reduced from 2.25 to 2.0
    • Level 15 Talent +50 Dark Ascension damage reduced to +40
    • Level 20 Talent +25 Strength reduced to +20

    Omniknight[edit]

    • Heavenly Grace can now be dispelled.
    • Degen Aura slow increased from 10/18/26/34% to 10/19/28/37%
    • Guardian Angel mana cost increased from 125/175/250 to 150/200/250
    • Level 20 Talent -3s Heavenly Grace Cooldown reduced to -2

    Pangolier[edit]

    • Shield Crash slow reduced from 25/30/35/40% to 20/25/30/35%
    • Shield Crash mana cost increased from 60/70/80/90 to 75/85/95/105
    • Rolling Thunder cooldown increased from 70 to 80/75/70
    • Level 25 Talent -28s Rolling Thunder Cooldown reduced to -25

    Phantom Assassin[edit]

    • Base HP Regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
    • Blur evasion increased from 15/25/35/45% to 20/30/40/50%

    Phantom Lancer[edit]

    • Level 15 talent -3s Spirit Lance Cooldown reduced to -2

    Puck[edit]

    • Illusory Orb cooldown reduced from 13/12/11/10 to 12/11/10/9

    Pugna[edit]

    • Aghanim's Scepter damage/heal increased from 200/300/400 to 250/325/400

    Rubick[edit]

    • Base Mana Regeneration increased from to 0 to 0.5
    • Fade Bolt attack damage reduction from 10/18/26/34% to 14/21/28/35%
    • Fade Bolt damage reduction per bounce reduced from 8% to 7%

    Sand King[edit]

    • Burrowstrike cooldown increased from 14/13/12/11 to 15/14/13/12
    • Burrowstrike cast range from 400/500/600/700 to 425/500/575/650
    • Caustic Finale fixed explosions not damaging illusions

    Shadow Demon[edit]

    • Disruption cooldown increased from 27/24/21/18 to 29/26/23/20
    • Shadow Poison mana cost rescaled from 35/40/45/50 to 45

    Shadow Fiend[edit]

    • Necromastery Shard critical damage increased from 170% to 190%
    • Level 15 Talent +80 Shadow Raze Damage increased to +100
    • Level 20 Talent +0.3s Requiem Fear per line increased to +0.4s
    • Level 25 Talent -40s Requiem of Souls Cooldown increased to -50s

    Shadow Shaman[edit]

    • Base Health Regen increased from 0.25 to 1
    • Level 15 Talent +100 Mass Serpent Wards attack range increased to 120
    • Level 25 Talent +370 Aether shock Damage increased to 380

    Silencer[edit]

    • Glaives of Wisdom intelligence steal duration rescaled from 10/20/30/40 to 15/20/25/30

    Slardar[edit]

    • Guardian Sprint cooldown reduced from 32/27/22/17 to 29/25/21/17
    • Level 20 Talent +100 Slithereen Crush damage increased to 125

    Slark[edit]

    • Base Attack Speed reduced from 115 to 110
    • Level 25 Talent +65s Essence Shift Duration reduced to +55

    Snapfire[edit]

    • Base Health Regen increased from 0.25 to 0.75
    • Mortimer Kisses duration reduced from 6s to 5.5

    Sven[edit]

    • Base Attack Time increased from 1.8 to 1.9
    • Storm Hammer damage decreased from 110/180/250/320 to 95/170/245/320
    • God's Strength duration decreased from 40 to 35

    Terrorblade[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 1.7 to 2.0

    Timbersaw[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 1.
    • Whirling Death Bonus Damage Per Tree Cut increased from 8/16/24/32 to 11/18/25/32
    • Level 20 talent +3% Chakram Slow increased to +4%

    Tiny[edit]

    • Strength increased from 28 + 3.8 to 30 + 4.0
    • Level 25 Talent 3 toss charges reduced to 2

    Tusk[edit]

    • Snowball cooldown reduced from 21/20/19/18 to 18/17/16/15
    • Walrus PUNCH! critical damage increased from 350% to 350%/375%/400%
    • Level 25 Talent -10s Snowball cooldown reduced to -8

    Underlord[edit]

    • Fiend's Gate cooldown reduced from 130 to 110
    • Level 10 Talent +125 Firestorm Radius reduced to +100
    • Level 20 Talent +12% Atrophy Aura Damage Reduction increased to 15%

    Undying[edit]

    • Base Mana Regen increased from 0 to 0.25
    • Level 10 Talent +50 Decay Damage increased to +55

    Ursa[edit]

    • Level 25 Talent +480 Earthshock AoE increased to 500

    Vengeful Spirit[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.8 to 3.4
    • Vengeance Aura Aghanim's Scepter illusion bonus movement speed reduced from 25% to 12%
    • Aghanim's Scepter illusion now has a hero HP bar

    Venomancer[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.0 to 2.8
    • Level 25 Talent 2.6x Plague ward HP/Damage reduced to 2.5x

    Viper[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 2.5 to 2.7
    • Poison Attack magic resistance decrease per stack increased from 3/5/7/9% to 4/6/8/10%

    Void Spirit[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent +60 Aether Remnant Damage reduced to +50
    • Level 10 Talent +2.5 Mana Regen reduced to 1.75
    • Level 25 Talent 2.5s Dissimilate stun reduced to 2s

    Warlock[edit]

    • Upheaval cooldown reduced from 50/46/42/38 to 35

    Weaver[edit]

    • Base Health Regen increased from 1 to 1.25
    • Shukuchi mana cost decreased from 70 to 60

    Witch Doctor[edit]

    • Death Ward damage increased from 85/135/185 to 85/140/195
    • Voodoo Switcheroo mana cost reduced from 250 to 150
    • Voodoo Switcheroo cooldown reduced from 70 to 40

    Wraith King[edit]

    • Wraithfire Blast damage over time increased from 10/30/50/70 to 20/40/60/80
    • Wraithfire Blast impact damage rescaled from 70/80/90/100 to 60/80/100/120

    Zeus[edit]

    • Lightning Bolt now targets the closest nearby non-hero enemy unit in range when ground targeted, if there's no heroes in range.

    External Links[edit]

    • GAMEPLAY UPDATE 7.30c
